entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
